name: simple-pos-middleware
description: Ultra-simple POS middleware with just order_id and payload - WebSocket notifications for CREATE/UPDATE/DELETE

scripts.build-exe: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/pos-middleware.exe
scripts.build-service-exe: npm run build && pkg dist/index-service.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/pos-middleware-service.exe
scripts.build-all-exe: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/pos-middleware.exe && pkg dist/index-service.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/pos-middleware-service.exe
scripts.build-all: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --out-path dist/executables
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run build-exe
